personal-dashboard-onboarding-step-1-bod: You are one of the first to try out this new feature! This is a central place that helps you contribute to Wikipedia by surfacing open tasks and useful resources.
personal-dashboard-onboarding-step-1-alt: Illustration of a page with three separate simplified dashboard panels.
personal-dashboard-onboarding-step-2-bod: In this first version of the dashboard you can review edits that might need attention, learn about relevant policies and guidelines, and track relevant statistics.
personal-dashboard-onboarding-step-2-alt: Illustration of three simplified dashboard panels being added to the page.
personal-dashboard-onboarding-step-3-bod: Over the coming months we plan to personalise the features in the dashboard based on your editing activity, and add new modules. We want to make this a valuable feature for editors on your project. To share your feedback, we have provided a survey link at the top of the page.
personal-dashboard-onboarding-step-3-alt: Illustration of a simplified dashboard where the top of the page has a darker blue section emphasizing the feedback link.
